microsoft.hawaii.hawaiiClientLibraryBase.Identities

Class ClientIdentity

  • java.lang.Object
    • microsoft.hawaii.hawaiiClientLibraryBase.Identities.ClientIdentity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdmAuthClientIdentity, GuidAuthClientIdentity

    public abstract class ClientIdentity
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents base client identity for the purposes of communicating with the server
